抶字的基本解释

抶
chì
用鞭、杖或竹板之类的东西打。

抶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《廣韻》丑栗切，入質，徹。］
笞击；鞭打。

抶字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　抶； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页423第14
【唐韻】丑栗切【集韻】【韻會】敕栗切，?音咥。【說文】笞擊也。【左傳·文十年】抶其僕以徇。【註】抶，撻也。又【襄十七年】子罕親執扑以行築者，而抶其不勉者。　又【集韻】陟栗切，音窒。直質切，音秩。義?同。

抶字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
抶字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
flog
chì
Hit with a whip, stick, or bamboo board.
flog
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Guangyun" ugly chestnut cut, into the quality, thorough. ]
Flogging; whipping.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　抶; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 423 14
[Tang Yun] Ugly chestnut cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Chi chestnut cut, sound howl. [Said the text] Lie hit also. [Zuo Zhuan·Wen Ten Years] 劶 its servants to sorrow. [Note] 抶, 挞 also. And [Xiang Seventeenth Year] Zihan prospered to build, but not to encourage.　 [Ji Yun] Zhi Li cut, sound choked. Straight quality cut, tone rank. Righteous? Same.
